main attack.name: Buckshot
main attack.about: Shelly's boomstick fires a wide spread of pellets to a medium range. The more pellets hit, the greater the damage.

super.name: Super shell
super.about: Shelly's Super Shell obliterates both cover and enemies. Any survivors get knocked back.

starPowers.name: Band-Aid
starPowers.about: Shelly recovers 1800 health every 20 seconds. Activates when Shelly's health falls below 40%

starPowers.name: Shell Shock
starPowers.about: Super Shell slows down enemies for 3 secs.
